name: RDMobile
tag_list: mobile, development, application, app, iphone, android, internet, interface, programming, developper, telephony
overview:
Founded in 2009, RDMobile is a start-up specialising in the development of mobile applications on all of today’s platforms (iPhone, Android, BlackBerry, etc.). It focuses on creating quality applications and manages the whole product life cycle, from initial artistic design and application marketing intelligence, right through to introduction to market. Its services also include graphics, sound creation, animation and video making.

Drawing on its considerable experience with older platforms such as Windows Mobile or Symbian (Nokia), RDMobile has made the natural transition to more recent OS such as iPhone and, of course, BlackBerry, but also Google’s rising star, Android. RDMobile is continuously abreast of market shifts and of the latest competing platforms such as Palm OS or Bada (Samsung), not to mention the all-new Windows Mobile 7.

Skills spanning a range of disciplines

  • We develop multi-platform applications to cover the whole mobile market.
  • We use ergonomic design features to make applications attractive and intuitive.
  • We create graphics and videos for application user interfaces.
  • We create graphics and videos to promote applications.
  • We deploy and promote our applications through various App Stores.
  • We create websites to promote and position applications in web search results.
  • We develop application websites (web services) for multi-platform applications.
